sub_title: Executive Business Partner | Project Manager | Connector | Ambassador ThePower Business School | Community Builder
summary:
Executive Business Partner who excels at Relationship Building, Strategic Thinking and Influencing. Proven track record in enabling leaders in fast-paced international high-pressure environments to focus on strategic matters and value creation, amplifying their overall reach and sharpening their focus while protecting their time and energy. Previous roles in recruitment and human resources enable me to set up operations from scratch to actively contribute to scaling operations and building high performing teams.  Growth mindset. MBA education by ThePower Business School. #Opentowork

Seasoned in handling change effectively. Proven ability in quickly grasping the essence of the business and the executives' needs. #Agility

Strategic planning of board meetings and business reviews, facilitation of strategy workshops. #corporate governance

I excel at context-based workload, time and priority management: the executives' deliverables and those of his/her direct reports are visualized into one single source of truth for timely follow up. #Activator

Not all members of staff might see the wood for the trees in a highly analytical context. I step into the game to provide the Big Picture. #Clarity #Holistic approach

I manage staff and support CEOs and their teams in hyper growth: I used to be the sole recruiter in the EMEA region to drive recruitment efforts resulting in a 10 x headcount growth in less than 2 years. Profiles hired: pre-sales consultants, sales managers, post-sales consultants, programmers, software developers, administrative staff (finance, legal, HR, administrative staff). #Upscaling #Hypergrowth

Research and content creation, announcements, monthly sales report. Compilation information for reports on the status of the business, peparing board papers.  #Communications

Creation of slides decks, connecting the dots to write structured presentations conveying a clear message for a specific audience. #Storyfying #Ideation

Organisation of large scale events. Coordination of marketing communications matters. #Events

courses.name: Cross-Border Training by Bonnie Low Kramen
Digital Marketing: Key Metrics & Concepts by General Assembly
How to Create Positive Habits by Susanna Halonen
How to Make the Most of Your Natural Strengths by Susanna Halonen
Insight Discovery Profile by Kristien Rogier
Introduction to Agile & Scrum by General Assembly
Lateral Thinking by Edward de Bono
Team Building related to exploring the main personality types (blue, red, yellow, green), their preferred communication styles and related behaviours
Workshop on Stress Management by Koen Gonissen
Workshops on Personal Branding and Pitching

profile_positions.description:
Support to CCO (cover for maternity leave): calendar management, travel booking, meeting scheduling with multiple stakeholders, note taking at board meetings.

Support to Haven Ventures: PMO-related duties: co-facilitate strategy workshops for investment assets of Haven Ventures: content creation/slide decks/research, defining KPIs for sales performance and revenue generation, financial perfomance and tech, preparation for OKR and goal setting. Corporate governance: strategic planning of board meetings and business reviews.
profile_positions.title: Ad-Interim Assistant to Chief Commercial Officer & Chairman Haven Ventures

profile_positions.description:
Executive Assistant to CFO and CEO & Founder at a health tech start-up: mailbox management, calendar management, travel booking, meeting scheduling with multiple stakeholders, note taking at leadership meetings (annual employment contract).

Project Management:
Refurbishment of the founder’s private office including installation of charging stations for electrical vehicles: purchases made within tight budget, oversaw works of builder, dealt with movers and other suppliers.
Investigated into the purchase of a pre-owned private jet: established initial contact and met with a partner to define budget and type of plane suited for intercontinental travel.

Human Resources Support: Drafted job descriptions and vacancies for support staff. Handled HR administration to hire and onboard non-EU citizens in NL.
profile_positions.title: Executive Business Partner

profile_positions.description: Project support role in a PMO environment related to the company-wide implementation of SAP.
profile_positions.title: Project Support Officer

profile_positions.description: During the global pandemic I focused on online learning. These self-development efforts resulted in obtaining a certification from ThePower Business School (see eduction section).
profile_positions.title: Exploring Future Career Opportunities & Online Learning

profile_positions.description:
High-level assistance provided to a member of the Executive Committee (Top 7). Effective resolution of administrative and operational issues often before they arose. Organization of complex intercontinental travel. Frequent interactions with clients, board level and other stakeholders.

Context-based workload, time and priority management visualized into a single overview sourced from ED’s mailbox, listing on-going projects, requested deliverables of the ED and of multiple stakeholders, reflecting the cluster’s, the entities’ and the individuals’ goals, targets and timelines tied to the company’s annual planning. 

Strategically planned and attended ED’s meetings with his direct reports. Took actionable minutes and ensured timely follow up.

Communications: research and content creation for presentations, announcements, monthly sales report. Clear and concise written slide decks. Responsible for compiling reports on the cluster’s status of the business for the CEO’s office and the supervisory board.

Program management support: the program management tool Wave was implemented company-wide. Liaised with initiative owners to track progress within a workstream, under the ED’s sponsorship. Participated in weekly status calls with core team and the transformation office. Issued reports on the workstreams’s financial impact and progress towards milestones set against the company’s overall long-term ambitions.
profile_positions.title: Business Support Officer & Executive Assistant to Executive Director

profile_positions.description: Full support to SVP and two of his Senior Directors. Outsourced by Jenrick Payroll Services.
profile_positions.title: Senior Executive Assistant to Senior Vice President Corporate Finance (ad-interim)

profile_positions.description: Outsourced as ad-interim assistant to the Executive Board to fill gap between the resignation of previous PA and the newly hired one. Duties included: organisation of Top 150 Meeting in Düsseldorf, travel booking and arrangements of logistics, diary management, set up internal and external meetings, handling ad-hoc requests; acting upon CEO's incoming email. Languages: English, Dutch, French.
profile_positions.title: Ad-Interim Assistant to the Executive Board (CEO & COO), outsourced by Assistant2

profile_positions.description:
Mid-August to November 2014: Ad-Interim Assistant (cover for maternity leave): PA to CEO at Philips Belgium and Head of Sales at Philips Lighting

My main focus was to support the CEO - who also headed up the sales organisation of the Lighting Business - in his daily duties to run the business. Duties included: anticipation to CEO's workload, diary management, handling ad-hoc requests, organising team building event for all staff, travel booking, taking minutes at MT meeting and follow-up of action items, liaison with worldwide HQ in Eindhoven, some support to account directors and the corporate controller. Languages: English, French, Dutch.


Cover from March till May for sick leave within IT EMEA environment at J&J. Both temping assignments were fulfilled for Randstad Management Assistants.
profile_positions.title: Ad-Interim Assistant, outsourced by Randstad Management Assistants

profile_positions.description: This period was initially dedicated to the renovation and extention of our house (a second storey was added): I oversaw the project from the architect's design through obtaining planning permission, price quote negotiations with the builder and several subcontractors, interior design and landscaping, always remaining within a very strict budget.
profile_positions.title: Home Based Project Manager

profile_positions.description: 24/7 support to the CEO, based at the global headquarters: extensive intercontinental travel (mainly Asia and USA), complex calendar management, anticipating frequently changing schedules and re-juggling multiple priorities, arranging logistics, taking care of business and private matters. Frequent interactions with executive leadership team, headhunters, internal and external stakeholders, direct reports and secretariat of shareholders/private equity.
profile_positions.title: Executive Assistant to CEO
